title: WTB - trying to put together a T206 Cubs subset
author: boxingcarddigest

posts.post_title: WTB - trying to put together a T206 Cubs subset
posts.post_content:
OK, I still have a long way to go (not quite halfway yet).  

Does anybody have any for sale that they could add to my list ?  Below is a list of players I need.  I am after "collectors grade" cards, between PSA2 and PSA4 with nice eye appeal.  I am after all PSA cards for two reasons - firstly I want to display the cards at home so they'll all match, and secondly I don't want to send in cards for grading and spend big $$ for the previlege of international delivery.

Send me an email at [url]bcd@boxingcarddigest.com[/url] if you have anything available.

  Brown, George    Batting 
  Brown, Mordecai  Cubs on shirt 
  Brown, Mordecai  Portrait 
  Chance, Frank    Batting 
  Chance, Frank    Red Portrait 
  Evers, Johnny    Cubs on shirt 
  Evers, Johnny    Portrait 
  Hofman, Solly    Batting 
  Howard, Del    Batting 
  Lundgren, Carl    Ready to Throw 
  Moran, Pat    Seated 
  Needham, Tom    Catching 
  Pfeister, Jake    Throwing 
  Reulbach, Ed    Glove Showing 
  Schulte, Wildfire  Front View 
  Schulte, Wildfire  Back view 
  Sheckard, Jimmy  Pitching 
  Steinfeldt, Harry  Portrait 
  Tinker, Joe    Bat off Shoulder 
  Tinker, Joe    Bat on Shoulder 
  Tinker, Joe    Hands on Knees 
  Tinker, Joe    Portrait

I have 2 matches from your list available:

T206 Chance, batting, PSA 3, $155
T206 Tinker, bat on shoulder, PSA 4, $210

Shoot me an email at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you'd like either or both!  Good luck with the rest of them.

Regards,
Adam

ps- Scans available under my PSA set registry page at:

[url]http://www.psacard.com/setregistry/publishedset.aspx?s=2336&ac=1[/url]
